title: 79/21 Coherence Rule ArXiv Paper
content: Comprehensive LaTeX document validating 79/21 rule across 23 disciplines and massive datasets. Mean 21.20% ±0.38%, p<10^-12. Includes Fibonacci echo, injection experiments, and full replication code.
formulas: Energy Partition: E_complement = 1 - ∫ P(f) df to 79%
gems: ArXiv-ready with full derivations and code
Injection experiments: Synthetic gaps trigger cross-domain responses
Implications: Predictive law tied to zeta function
validation: Statistical rigor p<10^-9, reproducibility via GitHub
source: LaTeX paper draft for arXiv submission
